story_galar_02_12000/2401_1001_0100_10: Listen up, members of Team Magma!
story_galar_02_12000/2401_1001_0200_10:
It is unacceptable for us to lose! Battle with
caution!
story_galar_02_12000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I’m only here to help the development of
humanity...and our leader...
story_galar_02_12000/2401_1001_0700_10:
If only Lear had just given up his mining rights,
we wouldn’t be in this situation...
story_galar_02_12000/2401_1001_0800_10: Whaaat? You’d better watch what you saaaay...
story_galar_02_12000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Criticizing Master Lear just ’cause things aren’t
going your way? How rude! You won’t get away
with this!
story_galar_02_12000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Rude people are, like, toootally gonna
get punished!
story_galar_02_12000/2401_1001_1100_10: I’m kinda scared of this battle...
story_galar_02_12000/2401_1001_1200_10:
A-all right! You, right there! You shall be
my opponent!
story_galar_02_12000/2401_1001_1300_10: F-fine, I accept! I’m going to crush you! Ahyahya!
story_galar_02_12000/2401_1001_1500_10:
I suppose this is the best we can do with
temporary staff... How unreliable.
story_galar_02_12000/2401_1001_1600_10: I am now one extremely peeved Oleana!
story_galar_02_12000/2401_1001_1700_10: I won’t let anyone interfere with Mr. Rose’s plan!
story_galar_02_12000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Guess that’s it for us. I believe in the young
master—and that he’ll win!
